definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_haspotioneffect"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:LightningStrike</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="strike_lightning"><field name="effectOnly">TRUE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="entity_set_fire"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="seconds"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><next><block type="deal_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type"><field name="damagetype">LIGHTNING_BOLT</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
